1. **Summary**:  
The image depicts the "Special-made Bone-Strengthening Pellet," a rare item in *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is described as a spherical object with a rugged, stone-like texture. This item is obtained from Xu Dog in Yellow Wind Ridge after defeating Chen Loong and fulfilling a quest. It plays a key role in advancing the storyline by granting access to the Zodiac Village when given to Chen Loong.

2. **Purpose/Role**:  
The image serves to visually represent the "Special-made Bone-Strengthening Pellet," highlighting its importance as a quest item in the game. It connects to the narrative by emphasizing its role in progressing through The New West region and unlocking new areas.
